definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: The safety valve shall feature a raised seat and non-mechanical disc alignment.
sentences.chinese: 安全阀必须配置凸出的阀座和非机械式阀瓣排列。

sentences.english: At the cost balance point on the institutional margin, the allocation of power achieves Pareto Optimality.
sentences.chinese: 在制度边际成本持平处权力的配置达到帕累托最优。

sentences.english: For example, this is the place to store configuration variables that will be provided in FreeRADIUS. conf.
sentences.chinese: 例如，这个地方用来存放配置文件的变量。

sentences.english: Many of these can be derived from the schematics or the memory configuration of your target hardware.
sentences.chinese: 许多这些可以来源于图表或对内存配置的目标硬件。

sentences.english: Could not allocate memory for a macro table.
sentences.chinese: 此巨集无法配置记忆体。

sentences.english: Can also be provided with a by-pass switch, model 8150.
sentences.chinese: 在8150型上还可以配置旁路开关。

sentences.english: Working with the right queue is the task of the adapter configuration, as detailed above.
sentences.chinese: 调用正确的队列是适配器配置的工作，如上文中所述。

sentences.english: You've now finished configuring the assembly diagram.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经完成了组装关系图的配置。

sentences.english: Pre-conditioner can make better products with high quality.
sentences.chinese: 可配置原料调质系统，使产品品质更佳。

sentences.english: Single set of pressing platens with both heating and cooling on the same platens .
sentences.chinese: 单套压台上同时带有加热和冷却系统的压台配置。

sentences.english: You can re-enable them from layout configuration later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在“布局配置”中重新启用它们。

sentences.english: Look at these new configurations for the computers we’re installing. Now ... notice that ...
sentences.chinese: 你看这些电脑的配置图表。

sentences.english: Conveyer's speed may dispose the control mode which the constant speed or may modulate velocity.
sentences.chinese: 输送机的速度可配置成定速或可调速的控制方式。

sentences.english: Versioning: Configuration of the repository-wide version store.
sentences.chinese: 配置存储库的全版本存储。

sentences.english: This section describes the system configurations, and more in-depth information about the workload.
sentences.chinese: 本节描述系统配置，以及关于工作负载的深度信息。

sentences.english: Topology and database configuration and management have been improved.
sentences.chinese: 拓扑和数据库配置和管理得到了改进。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
